forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Thunder possible. Low 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Thunder possible. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 59F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 15C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 41F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the evening, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
